Class RNAPolymer

java.lang.Object
  org.helm.editor.data.RNAPolymer

public class RNAPolymer
extends java.lang.Object

Extracted from PFRED by Simon Xi; Used by RNATableCellRenderer; Input data could be single strand nucleotide sequence, simple RNA notation or complex notation

Author:
zhangtianhong
